title: Joe  Haldeman-The Forever War
description: When it was first published over 20 years ago, Joe HaldemanÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s novel won the Hugo and Nebula awards and was chosen Best Novel in several countries. Today, it is hailed a classic of science fiction that foreshadowed many of the futuristic themes of the 1990s: bionics, sensory manipulation, and time distortion. William Mandella is a soldier in EarthÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s elite brigade. As the war against the Taurans sends him from galaxy to galaxy, he learns to use protective body shells and sophisticated weapons. He adapts to the cultures and terrains of distant outposts. But with each month in space, years are passing on Earth. Where will he call home when (and if) the Forever War ends? Narrator George WilsonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s performance conveys all the imaginative technology and human drama of The Forever War
